Detailed Description

template<class charT, class traits, class Alloc>
struct storage::types::BindTraits< std::basic_string< charT, traits, Alloc > >

Traits to bind basic string type.

Note
&v[0] is required to point to a contiguous buffer in C++11. While previous standards do not explicitly require this behavior, all known implementations conform to this rule regardless.
